entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Burk's Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:58 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.2°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
